title: Dhurandhar
notes: I loved this movie in all ways but the album... I absolutely love it. Watched this in theatre. An already 10/10 movie became a 100/10 because I watched it with my girlfriend :D

title: Mardaani 3
notes: An okay movie overall. Enjoyed it because watched with girlfriend in theatre. Nothing special in the movie though.

title: Kantara - A Legend: Chapter 1
notes: The movie shows how messing up with tribal culture can screw you up. The cinematography and the vfx are great. Loved it.
